summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BattleShip multiplayer game. Backend APIs are fully functional, frontend UI works well, but WebSocket room creation and chat functionality have issues.

integration_issues.issue: Create room button does not redirect to game page - WebSocket room creation message not working
Chat messages are sent but not displayed in chat area - WebSocket chat messages not being received/displayed

success_percentage.frontend: 75% - UI works but WebSocket integration has issues

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix WebSocket functionality: 1) Room creation via WebSocket not working - users stay on lobby page instead of being redirected to game room, 2) Chat messages are sent but not displayed in the chat area. Both issues suggest WebSocket message handling problems.
